text: Anata gata wa minai ka. Arrā wa kumo o kari, yagate sore o ai i-awase, sarani katamari ni sa re, yagate jiu ga, sonoaida kara furu no o. Mata hyō o fukumu, yama (no yōna kumo) o ten kara kudashi, kare wa, okonomino-sha o sore de uchi, okonomino-sha o yoke rareru. Inazuma no hirameki wa, hontōni me o ubaou to suru
